Title: Senior Manager, Master Data Business Product
Job_Description:
Job Summary:

The Walgreens Marketing Technologies team is looking for a Release Manager with a passion for automation and collaboration.

You will be challenged to collaboratively define, develop, automate, and own the release management lifecycle across the Marketing Technology (Martech) organization. You will play an integral role in helping to define, implement, and continually optimize an agile based and automated CI/CD platform.

You will lead the implementation and management of a consistent release calendar to cover new application development, application updates, patches, and security improvements.

You will play a key role in identifying and implementing CI/CD tools and services to automate deployments into various nonproduction and production environments. You will interface and collaborate with a strong team of Dev Managers, QA, Operations, and PMO to ensure releases in all environments are automated and deployed in a consistent repeatable fashion. You will support developers with the configuration of their environments.

To help us continually measure and improve, you will help define, track and publish regular release KPIs.

You will play a key role working with IT Management to continuously improve software engineering processes associated with continuously building, deploying, and updating software and cloud infrastructure.

One of the most important roles you will provide is managing and communicating risks and issues that affect release scope, schedule, and quality. You will be a key voice in determining go/no-go decisions on every release.
